resource.string: Steady Advance||

"Steady||Improves the unit's ability to endure enemy charges.
[[col:green]]Bracing, weapon damage[[/col]]"
Taunt Group||

"Precision Shot||Improved missile weapon damage for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Missile damage[[/col]]"

"Inspire Group||Your general improves the combat skills of friendly units within his area of influence for a short time.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, melee defence, accuracy, reload skill[[/col]]"

"Frenzy||Improves a unit's charge and weapon damage for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Charge damage, Weapon damage[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Exertion: fatigue[[/col]]"
Arena - Herd and Slaughter||A circular formation which allows entities in but not out. All entities within the formation are exposed to a devastating damage AOE.
Arena - Brace Yourself||Unit applies a braced stance which negates any charge bonus and reflects an initial attack.
Arena - Raise Shields||The casting unit raises their shields increasing their missile deflection chance.

Arena - Single Dismount||Actions a cavalry unit to dismount from their horses, becoming a melee infantry unit. This is an irreversible action as the horses will instant route after dismount is executed.
Arena - Battle Cry||Actions the casting unit into an adrenalin fuelled battle cry/scream. This applies a moral buff to allied units with a AOE.
Barrage||The unit increases their rate of fire, slowing specific unit types.

Arena - Wooden Swords, Steal Hearts||The casting unit is desperate and underequipped. They wear their hearts on their shoulders in a berserk like run. Outputting a high level of damage and ignoring any received damage for a period of time
Arena - Hold the Line||The casting unit screams for men to stay in rank. All allied units in melee combat within a AOE receive a melee defence buff.

"Defensive Testudo||The unit raises their shields above their heads in a static defensive formation.
[[col:green]]Bracing, armour strength, shield strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Can't move[[/col]]"
War Cry||
Stand & Fight||

"Cantabrian Circle||The unit fires whilst riding in a circle.
[[col:green]]Harder to hit, reload skill[[/col]]"
Light Infantry Behaviour||

"Pike Phalanx||The unit moves into a deep, close defensive formation.
[[col:green]]Bonus vs cavalry, bracing, melee defence, shield strength[[/col]].
[[col:red]]Acceleration, speed[[/col]]"
Kill Elephants||Elephant drivers will kill their mounts with spikes. To be used only if they run amok.

"Flying Wedge||The unit moves into a flying wedge-shaped attack formation.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus, melee attack[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration, melee defence[[/col]]"

"Second Wind||Target a friendly unit to remove any fatigue they may have.
[[col:green]]Fatigue[[/col]]"

"Screech||Reduces the morale of nearby enemy units.
[[col:red]]Morale[[/col]]"

"Inspire||Target friendly units to improve their combat skills for a short time.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, melee defence, accuracy, reload skill[[/col]]"

"Shieldwall||The unit moves into a close formation and raises shields.
[[col:green]]Armour strength, bracing, melee defence, shield strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration[[/col]]"

"War Cry Group||Reduces the morale of enemy units within your general's area of influence for a short time.
[[col:red]]Morale[[/col]]"

"Push||Target an enemy unit to reduce their defense against charges and melee defence for a short time.
[[col:red]]Melee defence, bracing[[/col]]"
Shock & Awe||

"Square||The unit moves into a close square formation.
[[col:green]]Shield strength, armour strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Can't move[[/col]]"
Fire & Advance||

"Brace||Target friendly units to improve their resistance against charges for a short time.
[[col:green]]Bracing, bonus vs cavalry[[/col]]"

"Stampede||Charges are more effective for an extended time.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus[[/col]]"

"Raise Banner||Increases your general's area of influence and improves the army's defence for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Area of influence, melee defence[[/col]]"

"Cavalry Counter-tactics||Improves unit's ability to endure enemy charges, especially cavalry charges, for an extended time.
[[col:green]]Bracing, melee defence, weapon damage[[/col]]"

"Headhunt||Gradual increase in effectiveness of the unit's attack.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, morale[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Melee defence[[/col]]"

"Frenzied Charge||Increases the effectiveness of the unit's charge for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Charge speed, charge damage, acceleration[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Melee defence[[/col]]"

"Trample||Charges are more effective for an extended time.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus[[/col]]"

"Rally||Improves morale for friendly units within your general's area of influence.
[[col:green]]Morale[[/col]]"

"Battle Rhythm||Target friendly units to gradually improve their combat skills for an extended time.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, melee defence, weapon damage, speed[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Exertion: Melee attack, melee defence, speed [[/col]]"
Taunt||

"Diamond||The unit moves into a diamond-shaped attack formation.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus, melee attack[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration, melee defence[[/col]]"

"Attacking Testudo||The unit raises their shields above their heads in a defensive formation.
[[col:green]]Armour strength, shield strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration, speed[[/col]]"

"Intimidate||Prevents a single enemy unit from activating its abilities for an extended period.
[[col:red]]Ability use[[/col]]"

"Quick Reload||Improved reloading for an extended time.
[[col:green]]Shots per minute[[/col]]"
Second Wind||

"Rally & Inspire||Target friendly units to improve their combat skills and morale for a short time.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, melee defence, accuracy, reload skill, morale[[/col]]"

"Wedge||The unit moves into a wedge-shaped attack formation.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus, melee attack[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration, melee defence[[/col]]"

"Frenzied Charge||Increases the effectiveness of the unit's charge for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Charge speed, charge damage, acceleration[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Melee defence[[/col]]"
Rapid Volley||

"Cavalry Testudo||The unit raises their shields and turns towards the aggressor.
[[col:green]]Shield strength, armour strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Can't run[[/col]] "
Arena - Make it Count||The casting unit focuses their eye firing a devastating volley.
Arena - Conveterani||Applies a moral buff within an AOE to any unit that has less experience than the casting unit.
Arena - cavalry_charge_1
Arena - Bloodlust||The casting units attack speed is increased for a set period of time.
Arena - infantry_charge_1
Arena - heavy_infantry_charge_1
Arena - Quick March||
Arena - Aquila||Applies a moral buff within an AOE. However if the casting unit routes or dies, then any units within the AOE receive a large moral debuff.
Arena - Stress||Torsion springs are overstrung resulting in increased range and damage at the cost of N damage to the weapon. Overuse can cause the weapon to collapse.

"Into the Breach||Target friendly units to improve their charge for a short time.
[[col:green]]Charge bonus, charge speed, weapon damage[[/col]]"

"Killing Spree||Increases weapon damage for an extended period.
[[col:green]]Weapon damage[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Exertion: fatigue[[/col]]"

"Hoplite Phalanx||The unit moves into close phalanx formation.
[[col:green]]Bonus vs cavalry, bracing, melee defence, shield strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Acceleration, speed[[/col]]"

"Shield Screen||The unit raises their shields in a static defensive formation.
[[col:green]]Bonus vs cavalry, bracing, melee defence, shield strength[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Can't move[[/col]]"

"War Cry||Reduces the enemy's morale for a short time.
[[col:red]]Morale[[/col]]"

"The Fear||Prevents any enemy units caught within your general's area of influence from activating their abilities for an extended period.
[[col:red]]Ability use[[/col]]"

"Use the Whip||Improved attack and fatigue resistance for a short time.
[[col:green]]Melee attack, weapon damage, fatigue resistance[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Exertion: fatigue[[/col]]"

"Rapid Advance||Improved unit movement speed over an extended period.
[[col:green]]Speed, acceleration, charge speed[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Exertion: fatigue[[/col]]"

"Chant||Improves the morale of any friendly units within the unit's area of influence.
[[col:green]]Morale[[/col]]"

"Second Wind Group||Your general removes the fatigue of any friendly units within his area of influence.
[[col:green]]Fatigue[[/col]]"
Regroup Position||

"Draco||Reduces the effectiveness against mounted units of any nearby enemies for an extended time.
[[col:red]]Bonus vs cavalry, bonus vs elephants, bracing[[/col]]"

"Row Hard 20||Increases speed for 20 strokes.
[[col:green]]Ship speed[[/col]]"

"Row Hard 30||Increases speed for 30 strokes.
[[col:green]]Ship speed[[/col]]"

"Row Hard 10||Increases speed for 10 strokes.
[[col:green]]Ship speed[[/col]]"
